overview.en: The platform token of Newdex decentralized Exchange, the total supply is 100 million and is issued on multi chains. It has supported ETH/BSC/EOS chain, and the token deflation rules remain unchanged. The value of Newdex platform token includes: buy-back and burning, staking discounts, candy airdrops, Ad bidding, self-listing, etc.
overview.zh: Newdex去中心化交易所的平台生态通证，代币总量1亿，且多链发行，现已支持ETH/BSC/EOS链，代币通缩规则保持不变。Newdex平台生态通证价值包括：回购销毁、抵押优惠、糖果空投、广告竞价、自主上币等。
